ISMS Policy: Does the document define an Information Security Management System (ISMS) policy in line with ISO 27001 Clauses 4.2 and 5.2? Provide any missing elements.
Roles & Responsibilities: Are information security roles and responsibilities clearly assigned (e.g., management, asset owners, users) per Clause 5.3? List any gaps.
Risk Assessment Methodology: Does the document describe a risk assessment and treatment methodology (identification, analysis, evaluation) as required by Clause 6.1.2? Summarize it.
Objectives & Planning: Are measurable information security objectives defined and planned (Clause 6.2)? Report missing objectives.
Asset Management: Does the document include an asset inventory and classification scheme covering confidentiality, integrity, availability (Annex A.8)? Highlight omissions.
Access Control: Does it specify user registration, authentication, and authorization processes aligned with Annex A.9? Point out any missing controls.
Cryptography: Are cryptographic controls (A.10) specified—algorithms, key management, usage guidelines? Identify any missing topics.
Physical & Environmental Security: Does it address secure areas, equipment security, environmental controls per A.11? Note any gaps.
Operations Security: Are operational procedures, change management, malware protection, backup and logging processes defined per A.12? List any missing.
Communications Security: Does the document cover network security, information transfer policies and controls (A.13)? Summarize missing elements.
Supplier Relationships: Are information security requirements in supplier contracts and monitoring (A.15) specified? Highlight missing parts.
Incident Management: Is there an information security incident management process (A.16)—reporting, response, lessons learned? Point out any gaps.
Business Continuity: Does it include an information systems continuity plan (A.17) that aligns with the wider business continuity plan? Summarize missing areas.
Compliance & Audit: Are legal, regulatory, policy, and audit requirements identified (A.18), and is there an internal audit process? Identify any omissions.
